Robert Collins

Born: September 6, 1885 (4, 7, 9, 10)

Birthplace: Milton, Rock County, Wisconsin (4, 7, 9, 10)

Mother: Paulina Juhnke (1, 2)

Father: Frank Collins (1, 2)

Wife: May Allen (3, 4, 5, 6)

Married: March 21, 1914 (3)

Marriage Place: Lake County, Indiana (3)

Direct Descendant: Roberta Collins (7)

Death: October 1978 (10)

Death Place: Rockford, Winnebago, Illinois (10)

Burial Place: unknown (?)

First Wife: Viola Manley2 Second Wife: May Allen Third Wife: Minnie 7

Imaged from Family History Library microfilm. Registration State: Illinois; Registration County: Winnebago; Roll: 1614545; Draft Board: 1
